com.untamedears.contraptions.gadgets

Class MatchGadget

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.untamedears.contraptions.gadgets.MatchGadget

  • public class MatchGadget
extends java.lang.Object
    A gadget which only consumes ItemStacks if they are the only ones present This can be used to specify a contraption being built It can be imported from a JSON object in the following format 
     {
   "itemstacks":
     [{
         "material": "MATERIAL_NAME",
         "amount": 1,
         "durability": 0,
         "name": "DISPLAY_NAME",
         "lore": "LORE"
       },...
       }]
 }
